text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: I made it!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
After making it to the meeting spot, check the weather. 
Just like the morning, it's sunny! Mmmmm～, it feels nice♪

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
After listening to the Diet broadcast, I'm feeling relaxed. 
And if I just say hello to everyone——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Then MiRule is all clear! 
With a refreshed feeling, it gets me excited～♪

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
——Ah. Everyone, over here! Good Miling～! 
Good work on the early training.

text_block_list.name: Loves Only You
text_block_list.text:
Hiii, Gran-chan! 
Today too, Love Me♡, Love You♡, Good Miling☆

text_block_list.name: Curren Bouquetd'or
text_block_list.text:
Good……Miling. 
I'm glad it's sunny today. It was a lovely morning.

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text:
G-good morn-……G-good Miling, Gran-chan. 
Sorry, did we……make you wait?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Nope, not at all! Ehehe, 
I'm really bad at waiting so I'm glad everyone made it on time～!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Alright, shall we get going!? It's been a while since we've 
gone out together, so let's play to our heart's content today～♪

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: I've really been looking forward to it, so tension's at 120 Miles☆

text_block_list.name: Athletics Staff
text_block_list.text:
Today, the batting corner is open! And at our 
special venue, there will also be a performance 
by professional gymnasts! And the highlight——

text_block_list.name: Athletics Staff
text_block_list.text:
Difficulty MAX! As seen on TV, Challenge Athletique! An obstacle 
course designed for ninjas!? So far nobody has cleared it!

text_block_list.name: Athletics Staff
text_block_list.text: Anyone is free to challenge it～!

text_block_list.name: Loves Only You
text_block_list.text:
Wah, it really does look hard……it's built to make 
it difficult to know how to move forward, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text:
T-that's right……even if you knew the route in advance, 
it still seems you'd need some real athletic ability.

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text:
The starting area in particular seems really intricate and 
complicated, so you'd really have to pay attention to your footing……

text_block_list.name: Athletics Staff
text_block_list.text:
That's exactly right! So many people couldn't make 
it past the start, maybe it's just too difficult——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Miler-!!

text_block_list.name: Athletics Staff
text_block_list.text: Ehーーーーー!?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
No matter the course, with these Miler 
legs of mine, it's no big deal!

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: A no miss clear!?

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text: And she didn't even trip or stumble at all……!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
How far is a homerun? Anyways, just really far right!? 
Alllright, I'll just keep my eye on the ball～!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: And swing-! Right through the middle, homerun!

text_block_list.name: Curren Bouquetd'or
text_block_list.text: Just like she said……! Magnificent!

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text:
Even just hitting it is so hard……just watching Gran-chan makes 
me feel like I'll get the wrong idea and think I can do it too……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Oooh, things are really heating up, huh～!? 
Hey, I've seen that gymnast on TV before.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Wah, amazing! She flipped and landed on the same spot! 
……so maybe like this?

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeeeeh……!?

text_block_list.name: Loves Only You
text_block_list.text:
I knew it already but, even seeing it with my own eyes it's hard 
to believe. She really has some crazy athletic sense, doesn't she?

text_block_list.name: Curren Bouquetd'or
text_block_list.text:
And she doesn't seem to show any fear when making a first attempt…… 
Is it because she trusts in her own abilities?

text_block_list.name: Curren Bouquetd'or
text_block_list.text: Once again……it seems like you have true talent, Gran-san.

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text:
I-is it just that your body moves without thinking……? 
All those movements that seem practiced are just instinctual……?

text_block_list.name: Loves Only You
text_block_list.text:
It's wonderful. It's just a feeling right? 
It must have been something you were born with.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa, thanks for the praise☆

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: ——But, I'm Gran Alegria, after all.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
The greatest Miler. 
I can do anything and everything.

text_block_list.name: Loves Only You
text_block_list.text:
That's right, how did that go? 
You said a super elite trainer wanted to scout you, right?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: Oh, that? I already declined!

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text:
Eh……Eeeh? Um……was there some kind of problem? 
Like you didn't agree on something……?

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
Nope. But you see, to be my trainer, 
they have to clear my conditions.

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
That's MiRule! Elite or rookie, it doesn't matter. 
If they don't mesh with MiRules, then it's a no go!

text_block_list.name: Curren Bouquetd'or
text_block_list.text:
Gran-san's MiRules……If you tell me the conditions, 
I can look for someone for you too……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
It's fine! It's my trainer after all, 
so I really should find them myself——……?

——During a break at work, I was recharging at a 
cafe. After sitting down, I placed a few of the 
training books I brought with me on the table.
choice_data_list: So that I can make any dream come true……

text_block_list.text:
I muttered softly to myself, I wanted to do my best. I didn't mean 
to say it out loud though so I panicked and covered my own mouth.

I wiped my hands with the warm towel provided to me, 
and remembering the horseshoe displayed in the store's 
window, I quickly folded it in to that shape.

I opened the menu and traced back and forth with my finger as I read 
through it. I tap on a few options, still unsure which to choose.
choice_data_list: I guess a salad to start……

text_block_list.text:
I had just about decided what I 
wanted to eat when I looked up——

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
……A towel folded in to a horseshoe. 
And finger movements as if you're measuring out miles……

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: And a tap, tap as if to signal a start!!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text: And a salad!!

text_block_list.name: Gran Alegria
text_block_list.text:
……I finally found you! 
Please become my trainer!!
